name: setjsonvalue
friendlyName: Set string value in a json file (appsettings.json)
description: Set a string value into a json file. The typical use case would be to set a configuration value into appsettings.json.
author: bendayconsulting
instanceNameFormat: Set string value in json file

inputs.name: filename
inputs.label: Json File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the json file to edit (appsettings.json)

inputs.name: numberOfLevels
inputs.label: Value depth
inputs.helpMarkDown: How many levels deep in the json hierarchy is the value that you want to set?

inputs.name: keyname1
inputs.label: First level name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the first level property in the json hierarchy.

inputs.name: keyname2
inputs.label: Second level name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the second level property in the json hierarchy.

inputs.name: keyname3
inputs.label: Third level name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the third level property in the json hierarchy.

inputs.name: valueToSet
inputs.label: Value
inputs.helpMarkDown: Value to be set into the json file.
